interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: YUHFERA Press on Nails Kit 30Pcs Fake Nails Short Coffin Nail Tips with Designs Solid Color Full Cover False Nails Set Artificial Acrylic Nails for DIY Nail Art Salon Women Girls Gift(Blue bird)
Review Date: 2021/10/15
Store: YUHFERA
Average Rating: 2.8
Product Details: {'Size': 'Medium', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'YUHFERA', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '2.95 x 2.91 x 1.06 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '785382442227'}
Review Text: Ok. I do not have very long finger nails. These press on nails were shorter than my actual nail. It looked terrible because my finger nail was poking out the other side. I didn’t want to clip my nails down just for a set of press on nails that were way too short. I am not into super long gaudy nails, but these are not even a natural length. However, if you are happy with the length, the stickers included to press the mails on to are pretty good! They lasted well and came off my nail easily when I needed them off.
Review Title: Great stickers, super short nails
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Colloidal Oatmeal Lotion by Lucky Super Soft, Moisturizing Lotion with Natural Oatmeal, Non-Scented, Fragrance Free, No Parabens and Phatalates, Perfect for Face and Whole Body, 12 bottles, 12 fl.oz.
Lucky Super Soft
{'Brand': 'Lucky Super Soft', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '144.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body, Face', 'Package Dimensions': '13.46 x 8.35 x 6.57 inches; 10.58 Pounds'}
These are absolutely perfect for my dry skin! I am on accutane and have really dry skin. This has been a perfect solution. I like it better than comparable brands like aveeno. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and NOT oily. It has a slight oatmeal scent that smells good but it is not overpowering at all. It feels like such quality going into my skin. I am obsessed. It is nice it comes in such a large quantity because I have a bottle at work at home and everywhere!
Perfect!

YUHFERA

Ok. I do not have very long finger nails. These press on nails were shorter than my actual nail. It looked terrible because my finger nail was poking out the other side. I didn’t want to clip my nails down just for a set of press on nails that were way too short. I am not into super long gaudy nails, but these are not even a natural length. However, if you are happy with the length, the stickers included to press the mails on to are pretty good! They lasted well and came off my nail easily when I needed them off.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Care Preference:** User prioritizes moisturizing products suitable for dry skin, particularly influenced by the use of medications that exacerbate skin dryness.
- **Ingredient Focus:** Prefers products with natural ingredients, specifically those containing oatmeal, and values formulations that are fragrance-free and free from harsh chemicals like parabens and phthalates.
- **Product Form:** Shows a strong preference for lotions, indicating a preference for formulations that provide hydration without leaving a greasy feeling.
- **Quantity Preference:** Enjoys larger product quantities for convenience, suggesting a need for sustainability and practicality in their skincare routine.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Demonstrates a distinct preference for a specific brand in skincare, indicating potential for brand loyalty if quality continues to meet expectations.
- **Review Behavior:** Tends to provide positive feedback on products that are effective, but has recently exhibited mixed feelings in reviews. Notably, the user emphasized functionality over aesthetics in a recent review of beauty products, appreciating durable application tools while expressing dissatisfaction with product proportions.
- **Nail Care Preference:** Exploring beauty alternatives, the user values practicality and functionality over purely aesthetic qualities, indicating a desire for products that perform well in real-world scenarios.

Overall, this user exhibits a clear inclination towards effective, natural skincare solutions that cater to sensitive and dry skin conditions, paired with a recent expansion into evaluating beauty products, all while maintaining an emphasis on product quality and practicality.
